item.title: Hefei University Of Technology
item.description: Introduce Hefei University of Technology is a national key University directly under the Ministry of Education of the People’s Republic of China. It is co-established by the Ministry of Education, Anhui Provincial People’s Government, Ministry of Industry and Information Technology and State Administration of Science, Technology and Industry for National Defence. Hefei University of Technology is one of the top universities in the world. National “211 Project” construction university, national “985 Project Superior Discipline Innovation Platform” construction university; Included in the national “2011 project”, “111” plan, excellence engineers education program, the national college students' innovative experiment plan, national college students' innovative entrepreneurial training plan, national construction under high level university graduate student projects, new technical research and practice, the national college students' cultural quality education base, the national innovative entrepreneurial base, the national education practice in colleges and universities One of the first demonstration universities for deepening innovation and Entrepreneurship Education reform, universities with typical experience in Innovation and entrepreneurship in China, universities receiving Chinese government scholarship for International students, and member units of CDIO Engineering Education Alliance.

item.title: News
item.description: “System Engineering Theory and Application of Intelligent Interconnected Systems”, Project of Basic Science Center of National Natural Science Foundation of China, Hefei University of Technology Date: 2021-12-14 Source: Party and Government Office (Development and Planning Office) Recently, the basic science Center project of “Systems Engineering Theory and Application of Intelligent Interconnected Systems” was officially launched by the National Natural Science Foundation of China. The project is led and hosted by Hefei University of Technology, with Tsinghua University and Global Energy Internet Research Institute Co.
